desc.p: This field holds the timestamp at which the event was created by Integration Framework.
This field holds the Integration Framework generated event data in XML format.

This field holds the timestamp at which the event was delivered through any of the available delivery mechanisms. An event record with this field having a non empty value indicates that the event is already delivered and the record is ready for archival.
This field holds the type of the event represented by this record.
This multi-value field holds the name of the data elements which make part of the event. The values for these element names would be recorded in the associated field “Field Value”.
This multi-value field holds the values of the data elements which make part of the event. The names for these elements would be recorded in the associated field “Field Name”.
